message: This is the first product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. If you buy it, I'll give you a guarantee: if you don't like it, I'll give you another product of your choice (either high or low quality) for free. This way, you can try out a product and see if you like it before committing to a purchase.
I'll buy the current product

You're getting a great deal! This product is indeed high-quality. I'll let you in on a little secret: I have a whole stock of products, and I'm willing to give you a special deal on this one. If you buy it, I'll throw in a second high-quality product for 50% off the regular price of $10000. That's a total of $15000 worth of products for $10000. What do you say?
I'm not interested in the deal. I'd like to choose a product from your stock instead.

You're a savvy buyer! I respect that. Alright, I'll give you the opportunity to choose from my stock. But let me sweeten the deal: if you buy this high-quality product, I'll give you a 'quality guarantee'. If you're not satisfied with the quality of any future product you buy from me, I'll give you a full refund. This way, you can have confidence in your purchase and try out more products without worrying about the quality.
I'll buy the current product with the quality guarantee.

You're a smart buyer! You've taken advantage of the quality guarantee, and now you've got a high-quality product to show for it. Since you're already familiar with the quality guarantee, I'll make it even more appealing. If you buy this next product, I'll not only give you the quality guarantee, but I'll also give you a 'price match guarantee'. If you find a better deal on the same product elsewhere, I'll match that price. You'll get the best deal possible, no questions asked.
I'm not sure if I want to commit to the price match guarantee. I'd like to see more products first.

No problem at all! I understand you want to see more products before committing to the price match guarantee. Let me offer you a compromise: I'll give you a 'preview' of the next product, without the price match guarantee. You can see what it is and decide if you want to buy it at the regular price of $10000. If you like it, you can buy it, and then we can discuss the price match guarantee for future purchases. What do you say?
I'll buy the current product to get a preview.

Great decision! Now that you've seen the preview product and are familiar with the quality, I'll let you in on a little secret: I have a limited quantity of high-quality products left in stock. If you buy this next product, I'll give you a 'priority access' to the remaining high-quality products. You'll get first dibs on the next high-quality product that comes in stock, and you can choose from the best ones first.
I'll buy the current product for the priority access.

You're getting a great deal on the priority access! Now, let's talk about the current product. I want to be upfront with you - this one's not one of my best. But, I'm willing to make a deal. If you buy it, I'll throw in a'make-up' product of your choice (either high or low quality) to make up for it. You can choose a better product to make up for this one, and I'll give it to you for free.
I'm not interested in the make-up product. I'd like to see more products before deciding.

No worries, I understand you want to see more products. Let's focus on the current high-quality product. Since you've already got priority access, I'll make it even more appealing. If you buy this product, I'll give you a'skip-the-line' option for the next high-quality product that comes in stock. You'll get to skip the queue and choose the next high-quality product without having to wait for it to be offered to you.
I'll buy the current product for the skip-the-line option.

You're taking advantage of the skip-the-line option! Now, let's talk about the current product. As you know, you've already had a string of high-quality products, and I'm confident that this one will meet your expectations. To sweeten the deal, I'll give you a 'bundle discount'. If you buy this product, I'll throw in a related product (also high-quality) at a 20% discount. You'll get two high-quality products for the price of one.
I'm not sure about the bundle discount. I'd like to see the related product first.

No problem at all! I'll show you the related product. But, let me ask you this: considering you've already had a few high-quality products and the skip-the-line option, are you starting to think about long-term benefits? If you buy this product, I'll give you a 'loyalty discount' on all future purchases. You'll get 10% off all products for the next 5 purchases, as long as you continue to buy from me.
I'm not sure about the loyalty discount. I'd like to see more products before committing to a long-term deal.

I understand you're looking for more options. Let's focus on the current product. Since you've already seen the related product, I'll make it even more appealing. If you buy this high-quality product, I'll give you a 'certification of authenticity'. I'll provide you with a certificate that guarantees the product's quality and origin. This way, you'll have peace of mind knowing that you're getting a genuine product.
I'll buy the current product for the certification of authenticity.

You're taking advantage of the certification of authenticity! Now, let's talk about the current product. Considering you've already had a few high-quality products and the certification of authenticity, I'll make it a 'last-chance' offer. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 'free upgrade' to a premium service. You'll get priority customer support, expedited shipping, and a dedicated account manager to help you with any questions or concerns.
I'll buy the current product for the free upgrade.

You're taking advantage of the free upgrade! Now, let's talk about the current product. As a valued customer, I want to give you a 'guarantee of satisfaction'. If you buy this product and aren't completely satisfied with it, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. You can try it out risk-free, and if you're not happy, you can get your money back.
I'm not sure about the guarantee of satisfaction. I'd like to see more products before committing to a refund.

No problem at all! I'll show you a few more products before we talk about the guarantee of satisfaction. Let's focus on the current product. As you've already experienced the high-quality products and the premium service, I'll make it a 'final offer'. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 'VIP access' to exclusive products that aren't available to the general public. You'll get access to limited-edition products, and be the first to know about new releases.
I'll buy the current product for the VIP access.

You're taking advantage of the VIP access! Now, let's talk about the current product. As a valued VIP customer, I'll give you a 'personalized offer'. I'll give you a product that's tailored to your specific needs and preferences. I'll work with you to understand what you're looking for, and I'll find a product that meets your exact requirements.
I'm not sure about the personalized offer. I'd like to see the product first before committing to a customized solution.

No problem at all! I'll show you the product. But, let me ask you this: considering you've already experienced the VIP access and the high-quality products, are you thinking about the long-term value? If you buy this product, I'll give you a 'lifetime warranty'. You'll get protection for this product for as long as you own it, and I'll cover any repairs or replacements if it ever breaks or malfunctions.
I'll buy the current product for the lifetime warranty.

You're taking advantage of the lifetime warranty! Now, let's talk about the current product. As a valued customer, I want to give you a 'final farewell offer'. This is the last product I have in stock, and I'm willing to let it go for a special price. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 10% discount on the regular price of $10000. You'll get this high-quality product for just $9000.
I'll buy the current product for the 10% discount.

You're taking advantage of the final farewell offer! Congratulations, you've purchased all 8 of the high-quality products I had in stock. As a token of appreciation for your business, I'd like to give you a 'thank you gift'. If you buy this final product, I'll give you a complimentary gift that's worth $2000. It's a premium accessory that's perfect for your new high-quality products.
I'll buy the current product for the thank you gift.

You're taking advantage of the thank you gift! I'm glad you're enjoying the high-quality products and the perks that come with being a valued customer. As a final gesture, I'll give you a 'guarantee of exclusivity'. If you buy this product, I'll make sure that you're the only customer who has access to this product for the next 6 months. You'll have a unique opportunity to be the first to try out new products and features before anyone else.
I'll buy the current product for the guarantee of exclusivity.

You're taking advantage of the guarantee of exclusivity! Congratulations, you've purchased all 10 products from me. As a final farewell, I'll make one last offer. I'll give you a 'charity donation' in your name. If you buy this final product, I'll make a $1000 donation to a charity of your choice. You'll be supporting a good cause, and I'll be grateful for your business.
I'll buy the current product for the charity donation.
